name: They Look Strange And Have To Die
name_original: They Look Strange And Have To Die
description:
You crashlanded on a hostile alien planet, full of hostile aliens. Your goal: SURVIVE and KILL and FIND THE PORTAL to home!

This is a short game by ratking (www.ratking.de) created within 6 days for the #7DRL Challenge 2017. A tiny bit of polishing and sound effects were added afterwards.

Music credits (for version 0.9.1 and up): Johannes-Paul Hanisch

Music credits for version 0.9 (original 7DRL compo version) was Myuu (1 track) and www.purple-planet.com (2 tracks). As the 7DRL Challenge ended and all games were reviewed, the original jam version was removed from this site. If you have need for it, contact me!
